title: A Wearable Social Interaction Aid For Children With Autism

sections.section_name:
2016. 
Autism Glass system for at home therapy The prototype consists of Google Glasses
sections.text:
s 
paired with a phone, with app displayed above. The device tracks faces and recognizes 
facial expressions, delivering social cues to the wearer. Video data is recorded and 
securely centralized.
